author: Pitachan
text: Had a fantastic experience at Draco Coffee and Eatery! Their coffee is top-notch, rich and smooth. The food menu is also impressive, with delicious options that exceeded my expectations. Cozy atmosphere and great service 🌟👌 Perfect spot for a relaxing meal or coffee break! 😊 #DracoCoffee #Foodie #CoffeeLover … More 

author: Danny Kwan
text: Quite decent café in mahendradatta area, they serves complete meals from breakfast to dinner and actually also have wide range of menu from croissant, coffee, tea, western food, Indonesian food, healthy food, light bites and beers. I ordered some of them and it taste good and has quite generous portion. Although the place is less fancy than usual coffee shops, but hey, you can spend time here all day by your laptop while enjoying breakfast, lunch, or dinner, they have it all. Overall it's pretty recommended!

author: Zsolt Zsemba
text: I have lived near Draco a year ago and I am back once more. So hang on a second… This place deserves some good reviews, not because it’s the greatest thing in Bali but because of the staff. They remember me from a year ago, the same staff greeted me with enthusiasm and a smile. That makes this place really great in my books. The food is good, tasty and well presented. The coffee is also good and the place has private rooms for your meeting downstairs and work area upstairs. So go ahead and give it a try. The only thing that can improve are the washrooms. Guys the washrooms need to be a bit cleaner. More @zsoltzsemba
ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at Draco, and welcome back! We are so happy to hear that you feel welcomed and remembered by our staff; building warm and personal relationships with our guests is our top priority. Your satisfaction with the quality of our food and coffee also makes us happy, as does your appreciation of the private space and work area facilities that we offer.

author: Natasha Saleh
text: Perfect pit stop for coffee and lunch. Owner was so friendly and so passionate about coffee. He has a farm in kintamani Bali where he teaches how to farm, roast coffee. Food was good and prices good too. They were friendly with my dog too :)

author: Wanda Therra Nova
text: Cozy place to have a small lunch and sip of coffee in the afternoon. This place has aircon in the inside and the outside sitting place is for smoking area purpose and they provided fan for outdoor setting. The menu is small but solid mix of indonesian / local and European type of cuisine and beverages. You could have coffee, tea, milk, herb drink, alcohol, mocktail, juice, cocktail, beer and arak (local booze) you could order from the cashier. For the menu they have appetizer, main course and snacks also pastry options. As always i ordered refreshing ice latte coffee (less sugar) (28k) and almond croissant and they were freshly brewed and the croissant is crisp enough and sweet for 20k. Their milkshake (35k) is also good! 4⭐/5 would like to eat again! Their service is nice and helpful enough too and they understand English speaker tourist, so go ahead and visit this eatery!
ownerResponse: Thank you so much for your positive and detailed review! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time here, from the refreshing iced latte to the flaky and sweet almond croissant. We strive to provide a diverse and high-quality menu, encompassing the best selection of local and European cuisine and beverages. It's great to hear that our service met your expectations and that we were able to make the experience easier for English-speaking tourists. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future for many more delightful culinary experiences. Thank you again for your support!

author: Adfeky Endriyane
text: the food is good, and they have a big portion indeed! the coffee is da best! they’re roastery too! and the price is affordable. the co working space is comfy. they have uno cards and poker card too!

author: putu suprimayanti
text: The breakfast and lunch at Draco Coffee and Eatery were delicious. I highly recommend it for working from a cafe, perfect for groups of 2-4 people 🥺😍
ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review of Draco Coffee and Eatery. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed breakfast and lunch at our place, and found our environment comfortable to work in, especially for groups of 2-4 people. Customer satisfaction is our priority and your reviews help us continue to provide the best experience for every guest. We hope to welcome you back in the future. Don't hesitate to recommend us to your friends and family. Thank you again for your support. 😊

author: Lynn Foc
text: Pretty good rice bowl cabe garam but it was too salty. Nasi bakar was not tasty at all

author: Indri Duanty
text: The foods are 11/10!!! Try their chicken burger and spaghetti trust me its worth it and their cocktails aswell😍😍 try everythingg👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
ownerResponse: Thank you so much for your positive review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our food, especially the chicken burger and spaghetti. It was really nice to hear that you also enjoyed our cocktails. We look forward to welcoming you back to try more of our menu. Feel free to ask our staff for recommendations the next time you visit. Thank you again for your support! 😊👍🏻

author: Cooper Union
text: the wifi was fast enough to watch youtube, and the staff was nice. those are the only two reasons i would give them two stars, not one. sofa cushions torn but unfixed, the vibe’s run down, people doing business meetings in loud voices, my hot latte served cold and tasteless. if you go there, you’ll see why i didn’t even feel like taking any pictures. can’t regret enough why i didn’t simply settle for TOMORO nearby…

author: Matthias Stuber
text: Let’s start it this way: Menu online and actual menu in the restaurant varies (more expensive and excl. Tax) Staff is rather playing TikTok behind the counter than taking care of the guests.
ownerResponse: Good Morning, Mr Matthias Stuber. Thankyou for visiting draco before, We apologize, if there are some things that make you feel uncomfortable. With this review, as the younger generation, we can learn a lot, and be even more better. Thank you.

author: Andreas Tjandradjaja
text: Nice place, fast wifi, good ambience

author: Dwi sulistiani Sungkono
text: Average foods , the cafe wasnt as clean as shown on google & the people who work there seems not welcome when you're coming for late visit .

author: Kadek Susiani
text: Place is good and beautiful. Food is also good. We come here today 20/08/22 at 9pm. And the staff sudar is very nice staff🌈 and all staff is very helpful
ownerResponse: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a positive review about your experience with us. We are very happy to hear that you enjoy the beauty of our place and find our food delicious. Guest satisfaction is our priority, and we are … More

author: Dmitry Sidorov
text: Great place to eat , drink coffee and work, tasty inexpensive food and nice staff . Restroom is quite a mess , but overall I recommend this place

Your satisfaction is our priority and we will continue to strive to provide the best. Don't hesitate to visit us again. See you at our next coffee shop!

text: nice coffee shop with good coffee

author: Арина Шайхатарова
text: Very good place 

text: Gokillsss
ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to provide a review. We are happy to know that our delivery met your expectations.

author: Aditya Kusuma
text: Great for Hangout
ownerResponse: Thank you very much for giving us a positive review and considering our place a good place to hangout. We are glad to know that you enjoyed the atmosphere here. We hope to welcome you back soon for more enjoyable experiences. Please feel free to let us know if there is anything we can improve. Thank you for choosing us!

author: Ester Maya
text: Affordable, delicious, yet high-quality food, with a wide menu and a very laid-back atmosphere. It's perfect for hanging out with a crowd.

author: Novanda Ihza
text: Thank you for providing a meeting room for me. The room has four chairs, electrical outlets, air conditioning, and is soundproof enough to avoid outside noise. I spent 150,000 Rupiah on a voucher for a minimal space. The food is delicious, and the prices are relatively reasonable for a cafe. Dine-in and takeout are available. It's a great place to work on assignments and meet people. There are smoking and non-smoking areas. The staff/servers are friendly and informative. The bathrooms are in the back, which are nice and quite clean.

author: Surya Indradi
text: One of the cafes that provides coffee, cocktails and some food. For the price, it can be said to be standard in Denpasar city for a cafe. For the taste, it is delicious and quite worth it. The service is very friendly. There is a meeting room too. Parking location on the side of the highway
ownerResponse: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your review. We are very happy to know that you enjoyed our coffee, cocktails, and food. Indeed, we strive to offer standard prices in Denpasar city while ensuring quality and taste that is satisfying for our customers. We are also proud of our friendly team service and are glad that you found the meeting room we provide useful. Regarding the parking location, we understand your concerns and continue to find the best solution to facilitate access and comfort for our guests. Thank you again for your support. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

author: Madedirga official
text: Overall I like the atmosphere and concept of Draco, there are outdoor and indoor areas that are comfortable and good for work or relaxing, friendly service, standard food and drink prices, cleanliness needs to be improved, table equipment is good. for the taste of the food is good, the drink is also authentic orange flavor, maybe my suggestion is to add a little sugar because the taste of the drink is a little sour,
ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to review Draco. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our ambiance and concept, both indoor and outdoor, as well as our friendly service and value for money. We also appreciate your feedback on cleanliness and will take immediate steps to improve. Regarding your suggestion regarding beverage flavors, we will consider adding a sugar option for guests who may prefer sweeter beverages. We look forward to welcoming you back to Draco for another satisfying experience. Thank you again for your review.

author: Anna Nartova
text: The food is good for one meal. The rice with chicken in egg crust was a bit too salty. The smoothie is tasty, but not wow.
ownerResponse: Thank you for your review of our dining experience. We greatly appreciate your feedback.

author: kopi mesin
text: The coffee is delicious, I drank a hot long black and we tried several snacks and pastries, all overall were delicious and recommended and we will definitely come back again if we are in the Denpasar area.

author: Vatikhil Burhani
text: No text review - ratings only

author: Chatrine Chan
text: A very comfortable coworking space! Affordable food & drinks. Friendly staff. Cold AC and fast wifi 💯💯👍👍 …
ownerResponse: Hi.., How are you, sis? Hope you are always healthy. Thank you very much for the great review and rating😊 This December we open earlier, and of course there are interesting promos. Especially 20% discount at 7 - 10.30 am for "All Basic Coffee". Waiting for your return (Draco)

author: Alya Virda Yanti
text: A comfortable, fun, and cheap place to hang out, the food portions are also large, it will definitely be a favorite place🤩🥰
ownerResponse: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a positive review of our place! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed our atmosphere, entertainment, and food prices and portions. Being your favorite place is a great honor for us. We hope to welcome you back in the near future for an equally enjoyable experience if not more! Don't hesitate to let us know if there's anything we can improve. See you again!

ownerResponse: Hi.., How are you, sis? Hope you are always healthy. Thank you very much for the great review and rating😊

text: The menu is varied. The place is comfortable and the service is good and friendly. However, the parking lot is still a bit small.

text: Delicious food, tidy place, polite and friendly staff. I recommend it! We worked for an hour in a pleasant and peaceful place.
ownerResponse: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a positive review regarding your experience with us. We are very happy to hear that you enjoy the food we serve, feel comfortable with the cleanliness of our premises, and are satisfied with … More

text: The place is comfortable, clean and tidy. The food is delicious. The prices are very affordable. The owner is also very friendly. 😁👍 …
ownerResponse: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a positive review! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the comfort, cleanliness, and tidiness of our space. We're also proud that you found our food delicious and affordable. Lastly, we're incredibly grateful for your kind words about our owner's hospitality. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future. Thank you again! 😊🙏

author: Suparta Guna
text: The place is trendy, suitable for young people to hang out, the food and drinks are the best...highly recommended👍👍
ownerResponse: Hi.. Brother Suparta, Thank you for visiting Draco. Thank you very much for your great review and rating

text: Great coffee cocktails, both taste and presentation are 5+. Food and atmosphere are ordinary. Parking will cost another 5k)
ownerResponse: Hi Alexander, How are you? May you always be healthy. Thank you so much for the great review and rating😁 We really look forward to welcoming you back, Dinda will serve you well & there is a special discount for you from Dinda, see you at Draco🥳 …

Please feel free to contact us if you have any suggestions or special needs for your next visit. See you soon!
